description.@en: One must have a callous indifference towards the sanctity of life to become an Assassin. This career tends to draw the bloodthirsty and insane to its ranks. Assassins who are consumed by the act of killing are utterly corrupted, while others who maintain proper decorum will remain untainted by their grisly work.

effect.@en: When you take an innocent life unprovoked, you automatically gain 1 permanent Chaos Rank.
